sentences.sentence: The vast majority of chief executives of big firms hail from one of a handful of grandes écoles, such as École Polytechnique, an elite science school.
sentences.translation: 超级公司的绝大多数首席都是少数大学校的成员，像巴黎综合理工学院——一个科学精英学校。

sentences.sentence: It has made a big effort to promote people solely on competence, says Charles-Henri Besseyre des Horts, a professor at HEC, a business school which is one of the elite grandes écoles.
sentences.translation: HEC的教授说他们只提拔有能力的人-并已经做出很大努力。 HEC来自于精英大学的一个商业学校。

sentences.sentence: In France the écoles maternelles play a big part in allowing women to go out to work, and the Nordic countries are famous for their affordable day-care centres with well-qualified staff.
sentences.translation: 在法国，为了让生育后代女性重返工作岗位，法国的“母亲学校”发挥了巨大的作用；
